step_feedback.feedback: Great job initiating the movement by gently squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Focus on making the motion a smooth circle.
You're doing well with the shoulder rolls! Try to keep your elbows and wrists more relaxed and in line with your shoulders as you roll.
Excellent effort on completing the repetitions! Remember to inhale deeply as you pull your shoulders back to maximize the benefit.

exercise_summary: You're doing a good job with your shoulder rolls! Keep focusing on squeezing your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Remember to breathe deeply as you move to help with lymphatic flow.
